game.name: Cosmik Storm
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 자막 옵션, 레벨 에디터 포함, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Cosmik Storm is a fast-paced single player FPS and space shooter with ray-traced graphics. As Earth’s last space marine, fight through asteroid fields and starships with advanced weapons, destructible environments, and physics-driven chaos to stop the robot apocalypse.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Cosmik Storm is a fast-paced single player FPS and space shooter with ray-traced graphics. As Earth’s last space marine, fight through asteroid fields and starships with advanced weapons, destructible environments, and physics-driven chaos to stop the robot apocalypse.
